section.p: "The non-proprietary, generic substance as which the same medicines is known in the literature independent of a specific manufacturer." - HL7 V3

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] code with data type Code
Identifies the generic medicine using some coding system such as RxNorm or NDF-RT.

Contains exactly one [1..1] name with data type String
"The non-proprietary, generic, or "established" name." - HL7 V3
Contains zero or more [0..*] product, where its type is Medicinal Product

Contains zero or one [0..1] code with data type Code
Identifies the generic medicine using some coding system such as RxNorm or NDF-RT.

Contains exactly one [1..1] name with data type String
"The non-proprietary, generic, or "established" name." - HL7 V3
Contains zero or more [0..*] product, where its type is Medicinal Product
